document_data.mainbody:
he seal of guidance was a unique enchanted token crafted by Laeral Silverhand for Saarvin in the late 15 century DR. It was one of many pieces of so-called "Silverhand gear" crafted for adventurers who helped to protect Waterdeep.
It was a silver chip into which Saarvin had carved a notch to commemorate each of his daring hunts into and beyond the Spine of the World.
The magic of the seal of guidance could be used to draw the attention of Saarvins enemies, which he could use to his advantage.
* Saarvin , a dragonborn ranger and scout to whom Silverhand also gifted the axes of the slicing storm.
